message:
Task due today:

{{ doc.description }}

This is a notification for a task that is due today, and a sample Email Alert. In ERPNext you can setup email alerts on anything, Invoices, Orders, Leads, Opportunities, so you never miss a thing.
To edit this, and setup other alerts, just type Email Alert in the search bar.
name: Task Due Alert
subject: {{ doc.subject }}

message:
Dear {{ frappe.db.get_value("User",{"email":doc.owner},"first_name") }},

Thank you for taking the time to fill out our eligibility form ({{ doc.name }} ). We are currently in the
process of reviewing your photos. If we should need any more information,
someone from our team will reach out to you directly.
Thank you for your time and patience.
name: Eligibility Confirmation Email
subject: Confirmation of {{ doc.name }} Eligibility

message:
Dear {{ frappe.db.get_value("User",{"email":doc.owner},"first_name") }},

We are happy to inform you that you have been chosen to be apart of our 100
Tomorrow's trail group.
Please click the link below to schedule a video call with one of our team
members to learn more about the trail and what we expect in the upcoming
months.
name: Approval of {{ doc.name }} Eligibility
subject: Approval of {{ doc.name }} Eligibility

message:
Dear {{ frappe.db.get_value("User",{"email":doc.owner},"first_name") }},

Thank you for taking the time to fill out our Eligibility Form.
Unfortunately, you do not meet the requirements for our initial test group at this
time. We will keep your information on file for future consideration.
name: Rejection of {{ doc.name }} Eligibility
subject: Rejection of {{ doc.name }} Eligibility
